text: Anna Anka born April 28, 1971 in Poland is an American model, actress and author and wife of singer Paul Anka. Anna Anka – earlier Anna Åberg – was born in Poland and was later adopted to a Swedish family in Bjuv, Skåne. In 1993 she left Sweden for the U.S and appeared in movies like Dumb and Dumber and Drop Zone, she also appeared twice in the TV-series Baywatch. During late 2009 she appeared in the Swedish reality show (Svenska Hollywoodfruar) which followed three Swedish women who had left Sweden for a life in Hollywood. Anka received American citizenship in 2009. == References == == Other websites == * Category:American models Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television personalities Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Swedish models Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:1971 births Category:Living people
title: Anna Anka
